content.question: The author mentions St. Paul’s “admonition” (lines 23-24) in order to

choices.label: argue that people instinctively partake in social interactions
explain why the church encouraged public gatherings
show that people will sacrifice enjoyment when necessary
highlight the ways people have changed over the years

content.answer: argue that people instinctively partake in social interactions
